trends: There have been 43 other sightings in Arlington
There was one other sighting in Arlington on or around October 24th 2008
Summary: I noticed at least 10 jet contrails over the DFW area the morning after the latest Stephenville sighting
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking my daughter to school and both she and I noticed that there were 10 or more jet contrails criss-crossing the sky over the DFW area on Friday morning (October 24th). That was unusual to say the least. It was then reported on our local news that another sighting had occurred the night before in Stephenville which is west of my location. I live off Interstate 20 in Grand Prairie, Texas and Stephenville is located off the same interstate. It was reported by the news that the local Joint Reserve base was claiming they had F-16s out the evening before but I've never noticed this many contrails before. These contrails were not fresh as they were thick and fluffy not like the usual ones we see around here which are thinnish. The time we saw these would have been around 7am. They were all over the sky but several headed off in an easterly direction following the interstate. It could be related to the air force's claims of maneuvers but it was unusual enough to get our attention.
